sentences.sContent: The concept of band osculation is presented by analyzing surface contact types.
sentences.sContent_eng: The concept of band osculation is presented by analyzing surface contact types.
sentences.sCn: 通过对曲面接触类型分析，提出了带状密切的概念。

words.tran: 接吻；接触；与……有共同特性

trans.tranCn: 接吻, 密切, 接触
trans.tranOther: a point at which two branches of a curve have a common tangent, each branch extending in both directions of the tangent
